story: The bridge of the IDS Folgore was submerged in a faint blue light when the night shift was interrupted by a sudden tremor of the structure. The panels on the right emitted a series of alarm beeps, and Commander Rinaldi lifted his gaze from the tactical screen.

characters.name: Commander Rinaldi
characters.description: The commanding officer overseeing the bridge operations.

characters.name: Tenente Serra
characters.description: A sensor operator monitoring the bridge conditions.

characters.name: Specialista Ortega
characters.description: An engineer responsible for diagnostics and system checks.

dialogues.speaker: Tenente Serra
dialogues.text: Un impulso gravitazionale, signore. Proveniente dal Settore 14. Non è naturale... e non è nei nostri registri.

dialogues.speaker: Specialista Ortega
dialogues.text: Sto controllando, Comandante. Ci sono fluttuazioni di campo che non riesco a identificare. Non sembrano emissioni note.

dialogues.speaker: Commander Rinaldi
dialogues.text: Serra, get an extensive scan. Gamma complete, and cross-reference with the last month's records.

dialogues.speaker: Specialista Ortega
dialogues.text: Comandante, I receive an active echo. Not alone.

dialogues.speaker: Commander Rinaldi
dialogues.text: Rally the shields to 40%. Maintain distance. Do not react until we understand what we face.

dialogues.speaker: Tenente Serra
dialogues.text: Comandante... it's about to send a signal.

pauses.speaker: Commander Rinaldi
pauses.description: During the command to raise shields.
